name: The Backrooms Speedrun
description:
This game was a challenge, and was made in 3 Days!In The Backrooms Speedrun, you're faced with procedural generation of the backrooms with the core objective of getting out as fast as possible. 

Other than the standard game mode, there's an extra game mode that features virtually infinite, procedural generation of the backrooms. Feel free to check it out, but it's a good idea to use a beefy computer if you enter the infinite generation mode!

Keep an eye out for the entity that only spawns when the Generation Brightness is set to 0.

Check out the video that shows how this was programmed in just three days!

CONTROLS:

  • [WASD] - Move your Camera in the Display Mode/Move Character
  • [Right Click + Drag] - Rotate your Camera in Display Mode
  • [1] - Place a Green Glowstick
  • [2] - Place a Red Glowstick 
  • [R] - Reload the Backrooms
  • [Enter/Return] - Generate the Backrooms
